info_text:
🛡️ Text ⇄ Code Converter Suite

Convert your text instantly into ASCII, Binary, Hexadecimal or Decimal and back again.

- Live conversion
- Multilingual GUI (EN/DE)
- Dark & Light mode
- Local only, no cloud, no tracking
